name: Chambered (First, Solo 15 weeks into Unity)
description:
Chambered is a class project part of the DDG230 PROGRAMMING FOUNDATIONS FOR DESIGNER class within the DDCT GD curriculum. This was my first 15 weeks into Unity and Coding.

Chambered is a simple side-scrolling shooter with a twist on the reload mechanic.
The players attempt to find the exit while trying to survive a set of armed and hostile swordsman.
